snippet.title: The Foretold: Westmark Legacy - A Unique Deck Building Adventure Game -LIVE ON KICKSTARTER
snippet.description:
Explore the world of Westmark Legacy and create your ultimate deck to defeat enemies and uncover its mystery. With unique battle mechanics and endless possibilities for customization, the game offers a thrilling adventure that you won't forget. 

Support our Kickstarter campaign and be the first to experience this exciting new game - https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/nodbrim/the-foretold-westmark-legacy
